Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Shenute the Archimandrite:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc: abba Senou] piar,/mand~rit/c: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of our holy righteous father, Abba Shenute the archimandrite O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
